Panorama Glass Lodge

Photography: Karen Guðmunds

Introduction

I'm a photographer and Instagram Influencer from Iceland and I would love to collaborate with you. I've been based in Bali for the last few months shooting content for hotels and restaurants. I'm in Iceland right now between March 15th until April (if corona settles down, quickly) and would love to capture some photos of your beautiful Panorama Glass House to share with my audience and for you to use in your own marketing or social media.

I've worked with villas and luxury hotels across Bali to help them capture authentic lifestyle photos or hotel photos of their space, including properties like Munduk Moding Plantationin, and Villa Amita in Berawa, Bali. If you are interested, you can view some of my photography at @karen_gudmunds on Instagram and below you can see some examples from Villa Amita photoshoot.

In exchange for 2 nights accommodation, I would be happy to provide: 15x professional edited photos and 3x drone photos of your beautiful lodge and lifestyle photos. A video walkthroughof the grounds and the lodge itself. A daily instagram stories to my audience, and a feature on my Portfolio website. While many influencers and bloggers might turn up and snap a few photos, I take incredible pride in my work and invest significant time and energy in capture content that will represent your brand in the best possible light.

Eager to hear your thoughts, Karen Gudmunds

Photoshoot at Villa Amita

In exchange

More photos to show what I did for Villa Amita

Delivered

To be able to showcase the best of the best of your beautiful glass lodge will I not post in realtime on Instagram Story. I will post one day later. All moments captured by professional camera will be posted on Instagram 1-2 later. Therefore, I can upload and edit the photos before showing my audience your beautiful place. All photos promised above will be delivered within 7 days after my stay. At the same time will I post all the images to my Instagram story with tags and upload all photos to my website, with a link to your site.
